Package game.actions

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AreaAttackAction
    An Action to attack surrounding Actors.
    AttackAction
    An Action to attack another Actor.
    BuyItemAction
    An Action to buy an item.
    BuyWeaponAction
    An Action to buy a weapon Created by:
    ConsumeAction
    An Action to consume an consumable item.
    DeathAction
    An action executed if an actor is killed.
    QuickStepAction
    Special skill which moves to the random surrounding after attack Created by:
    RecoverRunesAction
    An Action to recover dropped runes.
    RemoveAction
    An Action to remove actor from map.
    ResetAction
    An Action to reset the game.
    RestAction
    An Action to rest.
    SellItemAction
    An Action to sell an item.
    SellWeaponAction
    An Action to sell a weapon.
    SpinningAttackAction
    Special skill which attacks any actors in the surrounding Created by:
    SummonAction
    Summons either ally or invader within the surrounding at a chance of 50% Created by:
    TeleportAction
    An Action that teleport the actor.
    UnsheatheAction
    Special skill which deals double the damage Created by:
    WeaponExchangeAction
